mapper.insert: insert into department (dept_id, dept_name, dept_status, is_leaf, dept_level, dept_seq, parent_id) VALUES (#{deptId}, #{deptName}, #{deptStatus}, #{isLeaf}, #{deptLevel}, #{deptSEQ}, #{parentId})
mapper.update: update department set dept_name = #{deptName}, dept_status = #{deptStatus}, is_leaf = #{isLeaf}, dept_level = #{deptLevel}, dept_seq = #{deptSEQ}, parent_id = #{parentId} where dept_id = #{deptId}
mapper.select: select dept_id, dept_name from department where dept_status = 1
